scripts.postgres:start: docker run -d -p $(grep DB_PORT .env | cut -d= -f 2):5432 --name $(grep DB_DATABASE .env | cut -d= -f 2) -e POSTGRES_HOST_AUTH_METHOD=trust postgres:12-alpine
scripts.database:create: docker exec $(grep DB_DATABASE .env | cut -d= -f 2) psql -U postgres postgres -c "CREATE DATABASE $(grep DB_DATABASE .env | cut -d= -f 2)"
